sense.def:
Kdor je
worse off
ima manj denarja kot prej ali manj kot nekdo drug.

seg.quote: This budget would leave taxpayers far worse off.
There are lots of people worse off than us.

sense.def:
Kdor je
worse off
je v bolj neprijetnem položaju kot prej ali kot nekdo drug.

seg.quote: You believe the world to be worse off because of Kennedy's death.
